Two factor authentication (2FA) strength: Two factor authentication (2FA) strengthens access security by requiring two methods (also referred to as factors) to verify your identity. calendar.legend.working_day_desc: Standard working day. The plant operates with regular shifts and production/OEE is recorded.
calendar.legend.holiday_desc: Official holiday. No production is planned. Productivity indicators may be excluded.
calendar.legend.maintenance_desc: Planned downtime for preventive/corrective maintenance. Counted as non-working day.
calendar.legend.vacation_desc: Collective or area vacations. Production may be reduced or null according to planning.
calendar.legend.weekend_desc: Saturday/Sunday. By default non-working unless otherwise defined in the calendar.
calendar.legend.special_desc: Special configuration: exceptional days, events or temporary shift changes.
If a region is selected, only holidays a: If a region is selected, only holidays applicable to that region will be imported (national holidays always included).
Se establecerá la fecha/hora de fin a ah: The end date/time will be set to now and the user will be the current one.
If selected No, the UI will show a non-b: If selected No, the UI will show a non-blocking indicator instead of the full overlay.
